revised_title: Effects of Systemic Pressure on Pulmonary Blood-Pressure
tldr: The author discusses the relationship between systemic and pulmonary blood-pressure, explaining that the pulmonary circulation is relatively independent of the systemic circulation. They also mention the role of vaso-motor nerves in regulating pulmonary vessels and the possibility of further research on the topic.
